title: Souvenirs: Gifts from the Garden
features: Hardcover with dust jacket. 1994 159p. 10.00X10.00X0.80 PROSE AND POETRY WITH BEAUTIFUL COLOR PICTURES
description: Souvenirs is a stunning celebration of the untold treasures that can be gathered from the garden. Easy-to-follow instructions and professional tips encourage cultivating your own garden and exploring flowers and greenery in a variety of compositions.
